reasoning: Also known as metabolic syndrome. Chronic condition measured by prevalence. Global prevalence approximately 20-25% (22,000 per 100k) in adults circa 2005, varying by diagnostic criteria and population. Well-documented syndrome with strong epidemiological data.
source: Hu G et al. (2004). Prevalence of the metabolic syndrome and its relation to all-cause and cardiovascular mortality in nondiabetic European men and women. Arch Intern Med. 164(10):1066-76
